page.title: 10THE GROSVENOR CENTRE
page.content: They started building the Grosvenor in 1972 when 80,000cu.m.of earth were dug to make room for the foundations,1975 saw the opening.The centre provides a fully air-conditioned environment with 65 shops and 4400sq.m.of marble floor. There are always at least two Security Guards on duty on the site 24 hours a day policing' the shopping malls,help- ing the public by giving directions to lost adults and finding the parents of lost children.Seven security cameras, located around the Centre, are operated from an office above the upper mall.One is motionlessthther six can be moved by remote control to zoom in on the public Only five people work in the office but 2500 work in the shops.Heating is gas fired by boilers 100 times bigger than a normal domestic one.There are 12 more Grosvener shopping centres in England and the USA,Canada,Hawaii,& Australia.
